title: Kurumiwari Ningyou (Nutcracker Fantasy)
synopsis: The young girl Clara visits her Aunt Gerda and Uncle Drosselmeyer. Her aunt tells her scary stories about the Ragman, a creepy and mysterious man who turns children into mice if they don't go to bed on time. The Ragman is always spying on sleeping children searching for more victims.
staff: [['Nakamura, Takeo', ['Director']], ['Hoffman, Ernst Theodor Wilhelm', ['Original Creator']], ['Tsuji, Shintarou', ['Screenplay']]]
